notes.text: sap.m.MultiInput: Select all (ctrl+a) now selects the input text instead of all tokens
We've now fixed an issue in slide tile where the tile indicator buttons were not visible
sap.m.MultiInput:  Remove duplicate cut/copy handling to fix clipboard operations
sap.m.VariantManagement: copy items binding template into manage dialog
sap.m.MessagePopover: List view preserved after resize is now reverted
sap.ui.core.delegate.ScrollEnablement: prevent TypeError on null offsetParent
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: fixed focus of table rows in popin mode
sap.m.Dialog: Focus goes on the entire dialog when we have drag or resize
sap.m.Input: resolve iPad Safari rendering issue
sap.m.CheckBox: Fix state limitation for CheckBox
sap.m.Carousel: Responsive layout is now enabled
We've now fixed the width of slideTile and genericTile when they are placed inside a ushell section in sap_fiori_3 theme
sap.m.MessagePopover: List view is now preserved after resize
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: onfocusfail no longer throws an error
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: week numbering in Week and OneMonth view are shown again.
sap.m.Menu: introduce 'open' event
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: Sort appointments by start date
sap.m.Datepicker/DateTimePicker/DateRangeSelection: align with VD specification
sap.m.Tokenizer: Align Tokenizer mobile title with spec
Popups: Default popover padding is now removed
sap.m.MultiComboBox: MultiComboBox does not throw errors onAfterClose
core/Control: Improve focus restoration for busy indicator
sap.m.FormattedText: added <S> tag support
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: resize the popup depending on page
sap.m.StepInput: adapt to VD specs on mobile
